# Nauseating Dart (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]]) \[[[Poison Spells|poison]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Witch Spells|Witch 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** One poisonous stinger

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude partial (see text)

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 189

You spit a poisonous stinger around the size of a quill at a creature within range, as though you had fired a dart from a blowgun. You must succeed at a ranged attack to hit your target. The stinger deals 1d2 points of piercing damage and poisons the target, causing it to become [[Nauseated|nauseated]] for 1 round unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save.
